InstalledItem.Name: Radix
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd.
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

With more than enough get up and go to handle your vehicle’s daily energy needs, the Radix from Lightning Power Ltd. is a power plant you can count on to get you where you’re going.

InstalledItem.Name: Fridan
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Wen/Cassel Propulsion
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Fridan is Wen/Cassel Propulsion’s entry-level vehicle cooler. It has proven time and again that it can withstand even the worst environmental conditions, making it an ideal component for your vehicle.

InstalledItem.Name: Denning
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

With the Denning, you can now equip an award winning WillsOp radar to your vehicle.

InstalledItem.Name: M3A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 1

The M3A is Behring's entry level laser autocannon. The autocannon configuration offers modest damage per projectile and a fairly low rate of fire. As the most basic offering in Behring's weapons lineup, it features low power consumption, but poor power efficiency. It makes up ground for its shortcomings by being cheap, a feature many pilots are looking for when outfitting their ships on a budget.
